net.glowstone.chunk

Class GlowChunk

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.glowstone.chunk.GlowChunk
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.Chunk

    public class GlowChunk
extends Object
implements org.bukkit.Chunk
    Represents a chunk of the map.
    Author:
    Graham Edgecombe

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GlowChunk.Key
      A chunk key represents the X and Z coordinates of a chunk in a manner suitable for use as a key in a hash table or set.
